TopicTitle: The unofficially official 0.24-Kerbapalooza Thread - Now extra #HYPETRAIN!

Articles.Content: Yes, I would like for everyone to get back into their seats. Hype train is going to fly off da railz since we are going so fast!
You guys are insane. I love it.
We 502'd it for a bit there, guys. There's almost 500 people in General Discussion RIGHT NOW.

Your usually told to return to your seats right before the train comes into the station.

Or when experiencing turbulence... in air-trains?

well this train just made 40+ pages today. HYYYPEEEE

*fastens seat belt*
Oh god my Hype is about to send me into orbit
Oh my god!!

You guys are insane. I love it.

You haven't seen insane... yet.

You haven't seen insane... yet.

yea where is danny and wackjob there missing out.

You guys are insane. I love it.

you wanna see real insane? we can show you real insane... but that would break the bounds of reality and we'd all end up in a void state of existence... so that's a bad idea

You haven't seen insane... yet.

We're all trying to figure out if we should order lunch or not. This is pretty much the weirdest situation I have been in my entire work history.

Oh my god!!

http://i.imgur.com/LySXH3s.jpg

Fasten your seatbelts gentleman because the HYPERtrain is HYPING UP!
You guys on the hype train?
I think we're one steamDB update from the full .24 release!

Oh my god!!

http://i.imgur.com/LySXH3s.jpg

does that mean it's coming soon or it isn't?

We're all trying to figure out if we should order lunch or not. This is pretty much the weirdest situation I have been in my entire work history.

Our offer still very much stands!
Please return to your seats - Like an aeroplane when they tell you to return to your seats for landing?
It's so cryptic, I have no idea if we're one release or one hundred releases away.

Our offer still very much stands!

yep im still in though you should talk to Rowsdower about an idea...

We're all trying to figure out if we should order lunch or not. This is pretty much the weirdest situation I have been in my entire work history.

ARRRRGGGG !

Go eating, do not fall of inanition !!!!!

We were talking to send you pizzas, are you OK with this ?

Our offer still very much stands!

It's very much accepted if you guys truly want to do it, we're all just floating in bugslaying and the surreality of it all.
I really need to stop reading this thread! Can't resist feeling that 0.24 is about to come out!

We're all trying to figure out if we should order lunch or not. This is pretty much the weirdest situation I have been in my entire work history.

We want to help make it happen but we're hitting snags. Plus I think we just need one person to state they are going to order. Its going to cost X amount. They are ordering from Y Restaurant. PM for details to paypal to donate.

I think ill be fine donating a little but as its my daughters birthday in 5 days im in s**t creak in order of ordering the whole thing
I laughed so much about this coversation. And if you think we are insane, it has only begun.

Your usually told to return to your seats right before the train comes into the station.

Or on a plane if there is turbulence ahead...
